summary: This is an FAA aircraft registration statement for PLAN D, LLC, a limited liability company organized in the U.S. Virgin Islands. The document identifies Jeffrey E. Epstein as a member and Lawrence Visoski as the manager of the LLC, which is registering an aircraft.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Listed as a member of PLAN D, LLC, a limited liability company registering an aircraft, with his U.S. citizenship verified.

persons.name: Lawrence Visoski
persons.context: Identified as the manager of PLAN D, LLC who signed the aircraft registration statement on behalf of the company.

connections.description: Epstein is a member of PLAN D, LLC, and Visoski is the manager of the same LLC, indicating a business/management relationship.

events.title: Formation of PLAN D, LLC
events.description: The effective date when PLAN D, LLC was lawfully organized in the U.S. Virgin Islands.

events.title: Aircraft Registration Filing
events.description: The date when Lawrence Visoski signed and submitted the statement to the FAA to register an aircraft in the name of PLAN D, LLC.

keyFacts: PLAN D, LLC is a limited liability company organized in the U.S. Virgin Islands with an effective date of October 19, 2012.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is listed as a member of PLAN D, LLC, and his U.S. citizenship is verified.
Lawrence Visoski is identified as the manager of PLAN D, LLC and signed the aircraft registration statement.
The document is an FAA aircraft registration form filed to register an aircraft in the name of PLAN D, LLC, indicating Epstein's involvement in aviation assets through corporate entities.
